string.text:
The Glock 17 is a polymer-framed, short recoil-operated, locked-breech semi-automatic pistol designed and produced by Austrian manufacturer Glock Ges.m.b.H. Trusted by law enforcement officers and military personnel around the globe because of its unsurpassed reliability, optimal magazine capacity and low weight. The Glock 17 is easy to operate and maintain and is a versatile weapon that can be used for self-defense, target shooting, or combat situations.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: None
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: None

The Glock 17 is a polymer-framed, short recoil-operated, locked-breech semi-automatic pistol designed and produced by Austrian manufacturer Glock Ges.m.b.H. Trusted by law enforcement officers and military personnel around the globe because of its unsurpassed reliability, optimal magazine capacity and low weight. The Glock 17 is easy to operate and maintain and is a versatile weapon that can be used for self-defense, target shooting, or combat situations.
 The tactical variant of Glock 17 has some additional futures: integrated Aimtech Glock base for Red Dot sights, installed Pachmayr tactical rubber grip and threaded barrel manufactured by Double Diamond.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Docter Sight, Aimpoint T1 (low mount only), Trijicon RMR, Leupold Deltapoint PRO
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: 9mm suppressor
